actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (2d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (2d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Protect the Community
reactions.desc: When another capybear within 5 ft. of this capybear is hit by an attack this capybear can leap in the way becoming the new target of the attack.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 30 min.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the capybear moves at least 20' straight toward a creature and then hits it with Slam attack on the same turn that target must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone the capybear can make one Bite attack vs. it as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in swamps or muddy terrain.
